item.title: College Road SE19 at Crystal Palace Parade junction., 22nd August
item.description:
College Road SE19 at Crystal Palace Parade junction. College Road central island Keep Left board at the foot of streetlight column ID 2579 # 03 is broken. Google Streetview – board in question is also down in this view: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4243142,-0.0760879,3a,36.6y,176.89h,80.96t/data=!3m8!1e1!3m6!1sZIDXY3tRKQkDv1Zkmff8_w!2e0!5s20220901T000000!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D9.037033466118686%26panoid%3DZIDXY3tRKQkDv1Zkmff8_w%26yaw%3D176.8887546047881!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDgxOS4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crystal Palace Parade SE19 at College Road junction., 22nd August
item.description:
Crystal Palace Parade SE19 at College Road junction. Going south on Crystal Palace Parade you go over junction and immediately after is traffic lights on an island which pedestrians can use to cross the road. One of the Keep Left boards is off its base – please replace and pick up from pedestrian part of island. Google Streetview shows Keep Left board in question: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4241595,-0.0759503,3a,75y,212.95h,48.65t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sa_CoO5hL4vl65iXHknQpTQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D41.35468043583844%26panoid%3Da_CoO5hL4vl65iXHknQpTQ%26yaw%3D212.94650569230595!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDgxOS4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crystal Palace Parade, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole stretch of road up to traffic lights, 22nd August
item.description:
Multiple potholes along Road, the edges of both sides of road are disintegrating and various trenches in the road are apparent. The problem is worsening and is dangerous for all road users especially cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 71, Fitzjohn's Avenue, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pole been forcibly removed potentially exposing wires, 22nd August
item.description:
Franklin Road, by the Jet Garage, Penge Bus went over a pole that was on the corner of the road, has come out of the ground completely Caller unsure whether any exposed wires are there. A Resident Has placed the pole behind wooden fences behind a bush.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Franklin Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Utility Works and Temporary Traffic Lights

item.title: Crystal Palace Parade SE19 opposite side of the, 22nd August
item.description:
Crystal Palace Parade SE19 opposite side of the road to the Shell petrol station is a green air quality monitoring station which is graffiti tagged. Google Streetview: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4247535,-0.075635,3a,75y,94.1h,89.02t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sObheakgZx9OXulZZkaVaYw!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D0.9823241617941818%26panoid%3DObheakgZx9OXulZZkaVaYw%26yaw%3D94.09702437792272!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDgxOS4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

item.title: Litter all over the grass on Elcot Avenue around the bench, 22nd August
item.description:
Litter (some drug related) is covering the grass area of elcot avenue, it's under and around the bench area in particualar, all over the path way and on the road. Please can a team be sent to pick it all up. It's unhygienic, and not in an acceptable state. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 103, Friary Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven paving slabs gaps in between weeds growing, 22nd August
item.description:
MASSIVE TRIP HAZARD Neighbours have trip Prams get stuck Large gaps hazard for children Green not maintained so nature taking over All over pavements in area have been repaired but not this corner linking Macon way to roseberry

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Companies leave and burn things, 22nd August
item.description:
All around here is plenty of rubbish. sofa, chair, vegetable oil cans, etc. Every now and then people from the companies just randomly burn some of their stuff and the smell of the smoke comes into our flats on the other side of the grass wall
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ruston Road, Charlton Riverside, London

item.title: Urgent - clear hedges Auburn House for disabled tenants, 22nd August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bramblebury Road, Plumstead, London
